name: Zombie Escape
description:
There is only one escape from the zombie hordes, and that is the rescue helicopter. Unfortunately the helicopter can't land, and you can't reach the rope from the ground. There is only one option - pile up those dead zombies and climb your way to freedom - Although, this does mean you are RUNNING OUT OF SPACE!

Controls:

W - Jump

S - Crouch

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Up Arrow - Aim Up

Down Arrow - Aim Down

Right Arrow - Fire Gun
